mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_no, project_name, step_id, step_name, stage_name, contract_no, form_no, build_name, major_name, draw_no, change_no, change_reason, change_reason_detail, need_change_other, need_change_major, change_content, discuss_content, attach_no, attach_count, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_service_discuss where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_no, project_name, step_id, step_name, stage_name, contract_no, form_no, build_name, major_name, draw_no, change_no, change_reason, change_reason_detail, need_change_other, need_change_major, change_content, discuss_content, attach_no, attach_count, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_service_discuss
